name: Deepwaters
description: Deepwaters is an exchange which brings the trustlessness of DeFi to centralized finance, providing provably fair and secure operations. On Deepwaters, violations of asset custody and preferential access to order flow are rendered impossible by means of code and confidential computing. WTR is the native platform token of the Deepwaters exchange. It can be used for: -Fees on the Deepwaters platform, where it is accepted at a fixed redemption rate of $0.70. -Governance over the network, DAO, and DAO treasury -Access to additional features -Voting on new exchange features, token additions, and other functionality WTR is an ERC-20 token on the Avalanche C-chain.
